title: No Such Thing As A Free Lunch
description: A Data Visualization of Free and Reduced Lunch in the United States. Made using python and dash, this visualization was generated using publically available data from the National Center for Education Statistics (NCES).

title: Corpus Analysis of Philip K Dick
description:
Created topic models, keyword analysis, and similarity matrices from TEI formatted and vectorized corpus of Philp K Dick works, analyzed with PhiloLogic to produce concordance and key-word trends and cleaned and
NLP pre-processed. Focused on qualitative interpretation of results, as well as the reasoning and logic behind specific choices and their outcomes during both pre and post processing of the data.

title: SQL Lesson Plan Database
description:
A 3NF SQL database with modular lesson plan data and custom schema. Contains sample queries
to produce illsutrative examples of the database structure and reasoning.

title: Visual Lesson Plan Interface
description: Made a user-interface for my personal Lesson Plan and Agenda software using Tkinter. Used to display all lesson plan data in a rotating schedule with an editing interface; saved all data to local JSON.
